The TCP port on which the service is lis: TCP port on which the service is listening for incoming connections
The http port on which the service is li: http port on which the service is listening for discovery requests
The password of the vbus gateway: Password of the vbus gateway, default: vbus
Table of Serial Ports: Table of Serial Ports to monitor
The path to the serial port to connect t: Path to the serial port e.g. COM5 or /dev/ttyUSB0
The channel number if more than one seri: Channel number if more than one serial port is connected
